meanings.definition: A bivalve mollusk of the subclass Lamellibranchia, such as a clam or oyster.
meanings.sent1: The lamellibranch was carefully studying the sand for food.
meanings.sent2: I found a beautiful lamellibranch shell on the beach.
meanings.sent3: The lamellibranch decided to throw a party in its shell.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as wide as a lamellibranch shell.
meanings.sent5: The lamellibranch's shell shimmered in the sunlight.

meanings.sent1: The lamellibranch features were evident in the fossil.
meanings.sent2: She had a collection of lamellibranch shells on her shelf.
meanings.sent3: The lamellibranch pattern on his shirt made him stand out.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like lamellibranch pearls.
meanings.sent5: The lamellibranch design added a unique touch to the room.
